author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ي إِنَّ الرُّوحَ فِي لَيلَةِ الَّتِيْ انْتَهَتْ إِلَيْها أَيَّامُهُ قَدْ خَ
translation: He Who was Thy Spirit (Jesus), O my God, withdrew all alone in the darkness of the night preceding His last day on earth, and falling on His face to the ground besought Thee saying: “If it be Thy will, O my Lord, my Well-Beloved, let this cup, through Thy grace and bounty, pass from me.”
